title: Spicy Brie Quesadilla
directions: Brush one side of the tortillas with olive oil and grill on a ridged griddle for 2-3 minutes to heat them up nicely and get the markings
In a bowl, add the mango, red onion, jalapenos, cilantro, salt, pepper, and a lime squeeze
On a baking sheet, place the tortillas with the grilled side down, top with the sliced brie and mango mixture, then cover with another tortilla
Place in the oven for 8-10 minutes until everything is heated through and the brie has melted
Let them cool down for 4-6 minutes before slicing into triangles and serving
